external_references.description: Patrick Whitsell. (2025, August 25). Deception in Depth: PRC-Nexus Espionage Campaign Hijacks Web Traffic to Target Diplomats. Retrieved September 9, 2025.

objects.description: [STATICPLUGIN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1238) has utilized Windows COM Installer Object to download an MSI package containing files masqueraded as a BMP file.(Citation: Google Threat Intelligence Group MUSTANG PANDA PLUGX August 2025)
